channel.title: Vpn Infrastructure Research on Staaldraad
channel.description: Recent content in Vpn Infrastructure Research on Staaldraad

item.title: NAT-to-NAT VPN with WireGuard
item.description: A recent research project/idea required me to look into setting up a NAT-to-NAT VPN. The basic idea being that two NATed networks are able to communicate through a VPN and share resources. While researching possible VPN solutions, I remembered reading about WireGuard a new VPN that aims to be fast, secure and lightweight. This seemed like the perfect opportunity to both try out a new VPN implementation and accomplish the goals of the research project.
